body:
Hi Pete!


Did you take a look at the example scenes coming with radiance? They are
located in the obj-directory if you downloaded the sources (are they in
the binaries?). There are also scenes in the ftp-directories which you
can find on radsite.lbl.gov.


If you want something REALLY simple, either go through the manual that
comes with radiance or set up a room in your favorite modeler.


Good luck, and feel free to ask! Lars.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2006-July/003822.html).</sup>
